summary.description: > MEDIUM CONFIDENCE! | > CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'CDR1as', 'Role Circular RNA CDR1as ciRS-7 Regulating Tumor Microenvironment', 'ECM-receptor', 'CAFs' | The Role of Circular RNA CDR1as/ciRS-7 in Regulating Tumor Microenvironment | CIBERSORT is an analytical tool developed by Newman et al. to provide an estimation of the abundances of member cell types in a mixed cell population, using gene expression data | Absolute mode (beta) is now available
summary.name: CIBERSORT
